name: Web Development workShop
details: Dive into web development with this intensive coding bootcamp. Cover HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more. Build your own web projects and kickstart your coding journey.
speaker: Jhonkar Mahbub
s_details: Jhonkar Mahbub is a web developer and teaching enthusiast. CEO of Programming Hero.Johnkar's expertise spans a wide range of programming languages and frameworks, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. He's known for his problem-solving abilities and his knack for turning complex technical challenges into elegant and efficient solutions.

name: Project-Based Learning Workshop
details: Participants in this workshop embark on coding projects that apply the concepts they've learned. These projects span from straightforward tasks to intricate applications, encouraging creativity and real-world problem-solving.
speaker: Sarah
s_details: Sarah is a seasoned DevOps engineer with a passion for automating software development and deployment pipelines. She has led numerous teams in implementing CI/CD practices to streamline software delivery.

name: Game Development workshop
details: Turn your game ideas into reality. Develop a complete game, from concept to a playable prototype. Gain insights into game design and programming.
speaker: Richel
s_details: Rachel is a game developer and designer known for creating captivating and immersive gaming experiences. She has worked on award-winning titles and loves to share her insights into game development.

name: Cybersecurity workshop
details: Delve into the world of cybersecurity. Learn about common threats, ethical hacking techniques, and how to protect systems from cyberattacks.
speaker: Ethan
s_details: Ethan is an ethical hacker and cybersecurity expert who helps organizations secure their digital assets. He has uncovered vulnerabilities in various systems and believes in the importance of ethical hacking.

name: Data Visualization workshop
details: Discover the art of data visualization. Learn to create compelling charts, graphs, and interactive dashboards to communicate data-driven insights effectively.
speaker: David
s_details: David is a data scientist and machine learning enthusiast. He has a knack for transforming raw data into valuable insights and predictive models. David has a track record of solving complex data challenges.

name: App Development workshop
details: Join a fast-paced hackathon to build mobile apps from scratch. Collaborate with developers, designers, and entrepreneurs to create innovative mobile solutions.
speaker: Alex
s_details: Alex is a mobile app developer with a keen eye for user experience and interface design. He has built successful apps for both iOS and Android platforms and is passionate about creating user-friendly mobile solutions.
